summary: The module supplies helper utilities to build DGL graphs and heterographs, then runs a collection of unit tests that check graph, heterograph, and tensor serialization and deserialization across various formats, versions, and feature/label configurations.
business_intent: Ensure reliable persistence and backwardâ€‘compatible loading of graph data structures used in graph neural network pipelines, guaranteeing that models and datasets can be saved, transferred, and restored correctly.
